abstract.p: Peter Bemis, president and creative director at Frankfurt Balkind West, Los Angeles, is named to additional new posts of partner and chief executive; Ann Pichette is named to new post of executive vice president and managing director for Sprint consumer long-distance account at Draft Worldwide; Jim Elms is named to new post of media director for Nike account at Wieden & Kennedy (S)

block.p: * Peter Bemis, president and creative director at Frankfurt Balkind West, Los Angeles, was named to the additional new posts of partner and chief executive. * Ann Pichette was named to the new position of executive vice president and managing director for the Sprint consumer long-distance account at Draft Worldwide, Chicago, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies. She had been president at Harte-Hanks Direct, New York. * Jim Elms was named to the new post of media director for the Nike account at Wieden & Kennedy, Portland, Ore. He had been vice president and media director at Peter A. Mayer Advertising, New Orleans.
